relevant_statute: Rule 221(1)(a) of the Federal Court Rules, 1998
Section 12 of the Royal Canadian Mounted Police Act
application_details: plaintiff resigned due to alleged constructive dismissal by the RCMP
claiming bad faith, negligence, and discrimination under the Charter
decision_reasoning: claims are not plainly without merit and should proceed to trial
result_of_case: plaintiff's claim was allowed to proceed
defendant granted an extension to file their defense
